name: UpdateApmRetentionFilter
description:
Update an APM retention filter in your organization.

Use this tool to update a retention filter for APM in your Datadog organization. Default filters cannot be renamed or removed.

parameters.name: retention_filter_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the retention filter to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the retention filter.

parameters.name: filter_query
parameters.description: The search query for the retention filter, following the span search syntax.

value_schema.description: The search query - following the [span search syntax](https://docs.datadoghq.com/tracing/trace_explorer/query_syntax/).

parameters.name: retention_filter_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of retention filter. Valid options are: 'spans-sampling-processor', 'spans-errors-sampling-processor', 'spans-appsec-sampling-processor'.

parameters.name: retention_filter_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the retention filter to update.

value_schema.description: The name of the retention filter.

parameters.name: span_sample_rate
parameters.description: Sample rate to apply to spans going through this retention filter. A value of 1.0 keeps all spans matching the query. Expected to be a number between 0 and 1.

value_schema.description:
Sample rate to apply to spans going through this retention filter.
A value of 1.0 keeps all spans matching the query.

parameters.name: filter_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the retention filter that you want to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the retention filter.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the APM retention filter resource, should be 'apm_retention_filter'.

parameters.name: enable_retention_filter
parameters.description: Set to true to enable or false to disable the retention filter.

parameters.name: trace_sample_rate
parameters.description: Sample rate for traces containing spans that pass through the retention filter. A value of 1.0 keeps all matching traces.

value_schema.description:
Sample rate to apply to traces containing spans going through this retention filter.
A value of 1.0 keeps all traces with spans matching the query.
